channel.title: 10 email templates to use with your product
channel.description:
Hey there, We've created a set of email templates that you can use with your product / users. It's time consuming to craft good email series, so here's the list of email we've built (those are for the content, not vissual template :) ).
1. Product/ User Research 2. Schedule User Interview 3. Product Update 4. Beta Tester Invite 5. Feature Feedback 6. Feedback Response [yes ] 7. Feedback Response [no] 8. Status Update 9. Executive product update 10. Team Appreciation
[You can download the PDF here](https://roadmap.space/10-free-templates-for-product-managers/)
Hope that helps.

item.title: 10 email templates to use with your product
item.dc:creator: dominicstpierre
item.description:
Hey there,
We’ve created a set of email templates that you can use with your product / users. It’s time consuming to craft good email series, so here’s the list of email we’ve built (those are for the content, not vissual template ).

  1. Product/ User Research
  2. Schedule User Interview
  3. Product Update
  4. Beta Tester Invite
  5. Feature Feedback
  6. Feedback Response [yes ]
  7. Feedback Response [no]
  8. Status Update
  9. Executive product update
  10. Team Appreciation

You can download the PDF here

Hope that helps.
